wikipedia_page.main: Caryl Parry Jones (born 16 April 1958) is a Welsh singer-songwriter, broadcaster, actress, comedian, author and composer. She was born in the Flintshire village of Ffynnongroyw and attended Ysgol Glan Clwyd in St. Asaph, but now lives in Cowbridge, in the Vale of Glamorgan.

response: Since 2018, Fflur has been a stand-in presenter for the BBC Radio Cymru 2 breakfast show when main presenters Dafydd Meredydd and Caryl Parry Jones are absent.
* Caryl Parry Jones, radio presenter, actress and singer

Terwyn is still a regular voice on BBC Radio Cymru, contributing sometimes to the Caryl Parry Jones and Dafydd Du programme. He also is a stand-in presenter of BBC Radio Cymru's daily early-morning farming news bulletin, and on the Geraint Lloyd programme when Dei Tomos and Geraint Lloyd are away on holiday.

response: *Caryl Parry Jones (born 1958), Welsh singer-songwriter and radio presenter
Singer-songwriter, broadcaster, actress, author and composer Caryl Parry Jones was also born in the village.

Ibiza, Ibiza is a 1986 Welsh comedy television film which aired on Welsh-language channel S4C. It was directed by Ronw Protheroe and stars Caryl Parry Jones, Siw Hughes, Emyr Wyn, and Huw Chiswell. It covers the stories of three women as they go on holiday to the island of Ibiza.
*Caryl Parry Jones (born 1958), singer, songwriter, actress, composer
*The BBC launches a new station, Radio Cymru 2, opening with presenters Dafydd Du and Caryl Parry Jones.
